channel.title: Kinda...ok really...noobish question about monster spawning
channel.description:
ok, i will be straight...how do you make monsters? you know how items are ::pickup *item id* *ammount?
well what is it for monsters and objects. thanks for being patient with my stupidity...

item.description:
@gronk wrote:

lol, thanks a lot non-sarcasam

edit: crashed when i attacked lol. oops

item.title: Kinda...ok really...noobish question about monster spawning
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

::npc NPCID

spawned npcs might crash if you don’t have the teleX and tele Y code. Can’t explain much but you’ll find out. Search in Tut’s section and use the search button i’m sure you’ll find it.

Read full topic
